hackathon-description-text: To help you build a winning app we will introduce you to the latest cutting edge tools so that you can easily deploy your own single page app with a website backend, fully hosted in the cloud.

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: This prize goes to the best app fulfilling all the required judging criteria.
This prize is kept as a surprise and will go to the most popular app based on the attendees' votes.

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=North Akron Road, Mountain View, CA 94043, USA
hackathon-location-address: North Akron Road, Mountain View, CA 94043, USA
hackathon-description-header: Organized by CMU-SV for attendees (technical & non-technical) to learn more about HTML5 single-page web apps, build HTML5 single-page apps, get fed, and compete for great prizes.
